text: The Mayor of said District shall in his annual estimates include all necessary provision to carry out the provisions of law relative to the assessment of real estate, to be immediately available.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 47-209.

DC CODE § 47-211

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Items included in annual estimates--Provision for real estate assessment.
